Ok Jordan, Let's see what you have to do. # This assignment involves using context clues to help us learn new words. # Context clues are hints provided in a text, which lead the reader to the meanings of words. # You will press on the highlighted and numbered context clue, that helps you to understand the meaning of the highlighted word for each question.

Today we will be focusing on learning new vocabulary by using context clues. # Context clues are hints in a text, which can help us understand the meanings of words we don't know.
For this activity, you will be matching vocabulary words with the more common words that mean the same thing.

Question.text: Mr. Smith was very well known and valued in the community. # It could be said that he is a prominent figure. # Remember to replace and check your answers by hovering over a word with the mouse.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: There are context clues in the phrase, Mr. Smith was very well known and valued. # The key words, well known and valued, are clues that help us see that prominent means important. # So Mr. Smith is an important, or prominent figure.

Answer.text: _user_, please select an answer.

Answer.name: JordanIncorrect

Question.text: The soldier returned from war a hero for his courageous acts in battle.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Courageous is best replaced by brave. War heroes often risk death or injury to fight for a cause. So their actions are considered very brave or courageous.
